channel.title: Python on The Mindfield
channel.description: Recent content in Python on The Mindfield

item.title: From spreadsheet to print labels using python
item.description: As a plant biologist I routinely generate a lot of seed from the plants I grow and study. Pricipally at the moment this is the seed of Arabidopsis thaliana which is very small. To keep on top of things I catalogue all my seeds and keep a spreadsheet of all my seed.
